summary: The diff updates the centralized APP_VERSION to 0.3.101 and updates Footer to display it. It also adds/uses folder-navigation helpers intended to render a containing-folder-only path for search results and enable navigation from that path, and indicates restoring filename click-to-preview in search results. However, additional unrequested behavior changes appear in the search implementation (useQueries) and potentially other FileList UI/behavior beyond the two specified regressions.

hallucinated_features.description: Enhanced/changed subtree search behavior (client-side recursive subtree search with Unicode-aware, case-insensitive, diacritics-insensitive matching; fixes matching descendants; full-drive search when startFolderId is null).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to restore two regressed search-result interactions (clickable containing-folder path and filename click-to-preview) and did not request any search algorithm/behavior changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Additional FileList UI/behavior changes beyond restoring the two regressed interactions (e.g., sortable listings via header row clicks, fixed-width column layout, breadcrumb path styled as interactive pill, shared ID generator for all uploads).
hallucinated_features.reason: Constraints explicitly say not to change UI/behavior beyond restoring the clickable containing-folder path and filename click-to-preview from search results.
evidence: frontend/src/components/FileList.tsx (truncated; shows new/extra imports like sortFileSystemItems, FileListHeaderRow, generateSecure32ByteId)
